item.description:
Let's meet near the registration booth between 9:30 & 10 AM

Please see the Animal Rescue League of New Hampshire's website for more details. rescueleague.org

Events from 9:30 am to 2:30 pm, with the walk at 11:00am.

DIRECTIONS TO CAMP ALLEN, BEDFORD, NH

FROM THE NORTH:
• Take Route 93S to 293N toward
BEDFORD/MANCHESTER/MANCHESTER AIRPORT
• 293N becomes RT 101W (After going over the Merrimack River, stay to
the left when the highway splits)
• Take US-3 exit (Kilton Road/ South River Road) onto South River Rd (US
• Take a right and head towards Merrimack.
• After going under the overpass, turn R on Back River Rd (Dunkin’ Donuts on corner)
• Follow Back River Rd 1.3 miles to dirt road on your left (Camp Allen)
• Turn L onto Camp Allen Rd and follow dirt road past ball fields to the end
– Camp Allen

FROM THE SOUTH:
• Take Route 93N to Route 293N toward
BEDFORD/MANCHESTER/MANCHESTER AIRPORT
• 293N becomes RT 101W (After going over the Merrimack River, stay to the left when the highway splits)
• Take US-3 exit (Kilton Road/ South River Road) onto South River Rd. (US 3) Take a right and head towards MERRIMACK/NASHUA
• After going under the overpass, turn R on Back River Rd (Dunkin’ Donuts
on corner)
• Follow Back River Rd 1.3 miles to dirt road on your left (Camp Allen)
• Turn L onto Camp Allen Rd and follow dirt road past ball fields to the end
– Camp Allen

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: 5th Annual Pet Step, Camp Allen Bedford NH
